sentences.en: Failure induces a total sense of inferiority.
From constant telling, she came almost to believe in her own badness, her own intrinsic inferiority.
sentences.cn: 由于经常受到指责, 她几乎相信自己是个坏孩子, 有着劣等的本性.

sentences.en: He had a feeling of inferiority.
He had an inferiority complex about his looks.
sentences.cn: 他对自己的外表感到自卑.

sentences.en: He is always showing a sweet inferiority feeling.
sentences.cn: 他总是显露出一种极度的自卑感.

sentences.en: He was acting out his feelings of inferiority by being overly aggressive.
sentences.cn: 他通过过于暴躁好斗的行为来宣泄自卑感.

sentences.en: My sense of inferiority, my fear of handicaps, dropped away.
sentences.cn: 我的自卑和我对困难的恐惧都消失了。

sentences.en: Our inferiority in the Air was fully realised by all concerned.
sentences.cn: 我有关方面都充分感觉到我空军的劣势.

sentences.en: She accepted her inferiority to her rivals.
sentences.cn: 她接受了自己不如对手的现实.

sentences.en: She has an inferiority complex about [ because of ] her bad complexion.
sentences.cn: 她因自己的肤色不好而感到 自卑.

sentences.en: The enemy forces were reduced to absolute inferiority.
The invading force, conscious of their numerical inferiority at sea, decided on an airborne attack.
sentences.cn: 侵略军考虑到自己的海上兵力处于劣势, 决定采取空降袭击.

sentences.en: They believe that submission in no way implies inferiority.
sentences.cn: 他们认为服从决不意味着低人一等.

sentences.en: This kind of sentiment is a very interesting combination of superiority and inferiority.
sentences.cn: 这种情感是非常有趣的，是一种高傲和自卑的结合体。

sentences.en: Using a false accent over the phone is a sign of inferiority.
sentences.cn: 打电话时故意作出某种口音是自卑的表现.

sentences.en: Whenever Hung - chien met her, his feelings of inferiority rose like wartime commodity prices.
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 也每见她一次面, 自卑心理就像战时物价又高涨一次.

words.tran_cn: 差的；自卑的；下级的，下等的

trans.tran_cn: 劣势，下等，次级，自卑情绪
